column5: Enjoy the beautiful, serene neighborhood in this private family suite behind a detached garage. Sleeping 4 cozily, this room also has a treadmill and elliptical if you missed your daily workout before arriving! We are within 10-15 driving minutes of the entertainment district that is AT&T Stadium, Texas Ranger's ballpark, Six Flags, Hurricane Harbor and more!
column8: Studio Guest Home 10-15 driving minutes to Majors
